summary: Higlights the matching brace or surrounding ones.
name: showpairs-mutated
description:
This is a modified version of the script showpairs
(vimscript #626), written originally by
Anthony Kruize. When the cursor is on a brace, the matching one is
higlighted. Otherwise, the current surrounding braces (up to the depth of three) are emphasised.
install_details: Just put the script into your $HOME/.vim/plugin directory.
